roleset.name: restrict to the ground
roleset.note: GROUND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ground' based on sentences in the financial subcorpus. No comparison. (from ground.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: On routes to South America , the company had no backup jets [0] [*T*-2]to ensure delivery when planes-1 were grounded [*-1] [*T*-3] .

example.name: agentive
example.text: However , if the secretary concludes that a transaction has made a carrier unfit [*-1] to operate , [the department]-2 may revoke its certificate , [*-2] grounding the airline .
